name: Arctic Police Racer 3D - eXtreme Snow Road Racing Cops Pro Game Version
name_original: Arctic Police Racer 3D - eXtreme Snow Road Racing Cops Pro Game Version
description:
Get ready for an absolutely wild racing game where you go absolutely FULL speed on your nitro equipped police car!! Avoid traffic in the city streets, as you drag race through the streets to win the race!

FEATURING

* Realistic 3D graphics!
* Multiple camera views!
* Non stop racing action!
